column5: Whoa!!! Ya mean when I said I'd buy you a bottle of Scotch for teaching me to flycast you were underage? I'm appalled. Anyone with ethics, morals and respect for the law woulda surely said they were underage. Just for that I'm gonna drink some of the scotch, you prevaricating fisherperson, you.  Oh, wait. All fishermen are liars by definition, right?  Okay. You get to keep the scotch, unless you'd rather have Pepsi, or beer, or Ouzo if you really hate good booze.  BTW. I went out and bought a new fly rod rig so I'd be ready for the lessons.  Happy birthday, you young punk.  JF
EIGHTEEN?????  I just finished the thread. Okay. So it's Pepsi and Pablum then. We'll save the Scotch or Ouzo for next year.  JF
Off Topic...  John, your a scotch drinker? I have tried many... my goto favourite is The Belvenie... what is yours?  G

I'm still trying the single malts of the world. I promised myself not to jump to any rash decisions years ago and new ones keep showing up. In the meantime my staple is Famous Grouse on ice. I've tried a lot of single malts that make it taste great.  JF
happy birthday, hope its a good one.  jason
Happy B-day Bill!  All the best to you
Oh.to be 18 again.......and know what I know now  Happy B'day Bill, enjoy it, your only young once.

Thanks again guys.... Hey John, a PM will be going you're way soon... And I can get my fill of ouzo in Greece... the good stuff is tsipouro... fresh from the still  One year till I can find out what all this stuf you are talking about is like
The Macallen, twelve, fifteen or older even, is something special.  Almost the same age as the young Parker.
Happy Birthday Bill!! Hope it was a good one. Geeezzzzz, that takes me back 40 years
happy birthday!
Happy Birthday Bill...did someone mention "CAKE"...I likes cake !!!     Hey Jack...you sound like George Burns...
Happy Birthday Bill.  Hope you get what you want.  Joey
Geez Bill ...I missed your birthday. Sorry been crazy here lately. Well happy belated birthday Bill !!!!!!!!! Next year we can celebrate it properly!

It just occurred to me that I've coached hockey players older than you.  Don't worry about the Ouzo, grab some of that life stuff. It's even better. Yer at the very best age. Us old farts tell everyone that it just keeps getting better with age, but we really only mean wine and scotch.  There's just nothing better than being 18 - hopefully forever. I'm trying, but my wife is a wet blanket.  Happy birthday, you little punk.  JF
Enjoy your day bud Joe
Our little Billy is growing up eh? Happy happy to you, Captain of team 7.
Happy Birthday, hope you have a great day!
Happy Birthday Bill!!!  ... where's the cake?
Happy Birthday Bill...enjoy Your Special Day
hope you have a great birthday
Happy Birthday Bill !
Happy Birthday, Parker, best wishes too.
HJappy Birthday Bill. Hope you have a great day  Mike
Happy B-Day Bill, all the best !!
Heya Bill!  All the best on your birthday!
Hey Bill..... Happy Birthday... now that your legal you can partake in some Black Russians @ Bernies!  LOL  enjoy your day bud, and talk to you soon  G
Hey Bill, I hope you have a wonderful day and all your birthday wishes come true! All the best.
Happy Birthday Bill..........
Happy Birthday Bill!!
Happy Birthday Bill.  Guess we'll have to start calling you an old fart now

Thanks guys... I'll get ya some cake if ya come up here for it Glen, or I can mail it if ya give me you're address... gotta love the teaser, 18... almost old enough but only get to buy Porn and Lotto tickets... Have a good day all
Happy birthday Buddy.All the best to you on your birthday.Now lets get out fishing. Dan
Happy B-Day Billy Boy....Keep a weather eye on the horizon.  Tight Lines and Best Wishes  -Ramble
happy birthday billy.  Uncle Arttie
looks like he has to wait till next year to have a Black Russian Bernie!  G
....Well isn't this special.    Happy birthday there young fella!
I know G... rule breaking isn't my thing...  Thanks again all, drinks are on me... ohh wait I am only 18... maybe next year
HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!!!!!  Hope you have a great day Bill!
Happy Bday Bill! that means u finally have to get a fishing license!  for sure 18 feels different with the other ones ... don't worry... another year till you dump that fake id
